title: Customer Segmentation using RFM Analysis and K-Means Clustering
text:
Objective
Transform raw transaction data into actionable customer segments for targeted marketing campaigns.

title: Customer Segmentation using RFM Analysis and K-Means Clustering
text:
Methodology

Calculated Recency, Frequency, Monetary (RFM) scores

Applied log transformation + standardization to handle skewness

Determined optimal number of clusters using Elbow Method and Silhouette Score

Trained K-Means and interpreted resulting segments

title: Customer Segmentation using RFM Analysis and K-Means Clustering
text:
Results

Optimal number of clusters: 6

Clear, business-friendly segment profiles identified
